thread.section_title: The Westbourne Hyde Park - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Spring Break
thread.title_full: Spring Break - Review of The Westbourne Hyde Park, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Rosi N
title: Spring Break
text: Clean, quiet, comfortable, convenient. This newly fully renovated hotel, has it all. It is conveniently located 5 min walking from Hyde park, and underground station, while it is nested in a quiet street. The small kitchen with pots, pans, fridge and Nesperso coffee maker gives you the option to relax in your room. We truly enjoyed our one week stay here. Thanks to the friendly and welcoming staff.
